recipes.name: pasta
recipes.instructions: heat pasta sauce in a pan and add pasta

recipes.name: instant noodles
recipes.instructions: boil water and add noodles and tastemaker and cook for two minutes

recipes.name: instant soup
recipes.instructions: boil water and add the soup powder and cook for two minutes. Serve hot!

recipes.name: coffee
recipes.instructions: boil milk. Then, add coffee powder and sugar to it

recipes.name: boiled chicken
recipes.instructions: put salt and chicken in water and bring to boil

recipes.name: tea
recipes.instructions: boil water and insert tea bag
